item.title: ‘Frankenstein’ Star Christoph Waltz on Guillermo del Toro’s Practical Filmmaking: “CGI is For Losers”
item.description: The ‘Frankenstein’ press conference at the Venice Film Festival found Waltz speaking only six words, leaving Guillermo del Toro and stars Oscar Isaac, Jacob Elordi, Mia Goth and more to pick up the sl

item.title: Jacob Elordi, Oscar Isaac, Mia Goth Feature in New Images From Guillermo Del Toro’s ‘Frankenstein’
item.description: The movie, produced by del Toro and also starring Charles Dance and Christoph Waltz, is set to premiere at this year’s Venice Film Festival, followed by a global release on Netflix in November.
